thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Forfarmers Creates Joint Venture With Tasomix In Poland

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Forfarmers Creates Joint Venture With Tasomix In Poland
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - FORFARMERS NV:
* REG-FORFARMERS N.V.: FORFARMERS EXTENDS EUROPEAN LEADERSHIP POSITION BY CREATING JOINT VENTURE WITH TASOMIX IN POLAND
* SIGNED A SHARE PURCHASE AGREEMENT WITH OWNERS OF POLISH COMPANY TASOMIX TO ACQUIRE 60% OF THEIR SHARES
* FORFARMERS ACQUIRES A BUSINESS WITH TWO OPERATIONAL PRODUCTION FACILITIES AND ONE NEW FACILITY, WHICH IS UNDER CONSTRUCTION
* AT CLOSING OF TRANSACTION, FORFARMERS WILL MAKE A FIRST PAYMENT OF PLN 234 MILLION (CURRENTLY APPROXIMATELY EUR 56 MILLION)
* FORFAMERS WILL RECEIVE 60% OF SHARES AND PAY PLN 234 MILLION IN CASH
* SECOND PAYMENT WILL BE MADE IN 2021 AND IS DEPENDENT ON ACHIEVING SPECIFIED TARGETS
* AT CLOSING OF TRANSACTION, FORFARMERS WILL MAKE FIRST PAYMENT OF PLN 234 MILLION
* AT CLOSING OF TRANSACTION, FORFARMERS WILL RECEIVE 60% OF SHARES
* AGREEMENT INCLUDES POSSIBILITY FOR FORFARMERS TO OVER TIME OBTAIN REMAINING SHARES.
* TASOMIX IS EXPECTED TO CONTRIBUTE TO 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
